definitions.definition: A person who lives in a mountainous area (often with the connotation that such people are outlaws or uncivilized ).
A person who climbs mountains for sport or pleasure .
An animal or plant that is native to a mountainous area.
A bird of the genus Oreonympha ; also called the bearded mountaineer or eastern mountaineer

main_definition: ( now rare ) A person who lives in a mountainous area (often with the connotation that such people are outlaws or uncivilized ). [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: A person who climbs mountains for sport or pleasure . [from 19th c.]
( obsolete ) An animal or plant that is native to a mountainous area.
A bird of the genus Oreonympha ; also called the bearded mountaineer or eastern mountaineer
